name: A group
blocks:
# METADATA
# custom:
#   plainid:
#     kind: DynamicGroup
#     name: A group
#     id: c282faf5-ed6c-4e22-ac32-22d9b16117ab
dynamic_group(identity) if {
	identity.template == "Employees"
	identity["uid"] == "A"
}

name: Employees All Users
blocks:
# METADATA
# custom:
#   plainid:
#     kind: DynamicGroup
#     name: Employees All Users
#     id: 4e5f4825-7920-4892-be28-eb5d70c73552
#     description: "Predefined Dynamic Group. All Users contains all organization's users defined in the IDP"
dynamic_group(identity) if {
	identity.template == "Employees"
}

name: uniqe name! All Users
blocks:
# METADATA
# custom:
#   plainid:
#     kind: DynamicGroup
#     name: uniqe name! All Users
#     id: 32d44f0a-36b5-4fe9-b615-c48b7d1a68f7
#     description: "Predefined Dynamic Group. All Users contains all organization's users defined in the IDP"
dynamic_group(identity) if {
	identity.template == "uniqename"
}

name: User All Users
blocks:
# METADATA
# custom:
#   plainid:
#     kind: DynamicGroup
#     name: User All Users
#     id: 9c1bfd12-d8b9-456e-bc0a-de3ed2a144b4
#     description: "Predefined Dynamic Group. All Users contains all organization's users defined in the IDP"
dynamic_group(identity) if {
	identity.template == "User"
}

name: user is 1
blocks:
# METADATA
# custom:
#   plainid:
#     kind: DynamicGroup
#     name: user is 1
#     id: e5e36842-d185-4bad-9fea-53fa0c8127cd
dynamic_group(identity) if {
	identity.template == "User"
	identity["uid"] == "1"
}
